name: Not So Dead
description:
IOS Version will be available soon. Sorry for inconvenience.

Hidden inside a post-apocalyptic city, a small paramilitary team takes shelter in a fortified base while being relentlessly pursued by hordes of zombies.
Your goal consists on running through wrecked streets in the search for food by making your way through unending waves of undeads.

Available Characters

You'll be able to take part in this decisive task by putting yourself on Arnold's and Cyriel's shoes, our brave heroes.

Will you dare to figth those dead who are desperate to feed on you or will you stick to food scavenging by dodging enemies and obstacles?

Game Content

Enjoy an extraordinary action mood under an acid conjunction of skill and dynamism, all through accurate shots and real-time strategy.

Player Mechanics

You'll be able to run, use special, character-specific abilities, jump over obstacles 'à la parkour', make enemy hordes explode, and above all shoot again and again. You have at your disposal all the ammo you will need; your only worry in that concern will be to aim propely and to empty as many weapon magazines as you can. Well and of course to enjoy the music!

Enemies

Zombie variety isn't scarce in this game. These damned citizens, each with their own perks and behaviours, will try to give you a hard time, and also an unwanted scare-jump from time to time.


As well as other not-so-photogenic dead you'll have to find and annihilate!

How many hordes will you be able to survive? Available in English and Spanish. Doesn't require any hearing skill to be played. Sound effects and voices purely improve the gaming experience.   Juego disponible en inglés y español. No requiere ninguna habilidad auditiva para ser jugado. Los efectos de sonido y las voces mejoran la experiencia de juego.
